short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a companion to the AstroStore.io web app. Use this extension to save bookmarks as you browse :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install this tool to quickly save bookmarks as you browse -- without having to navigate back to the main app. Look for the astronaut in your toolbar!
